website_summaries.verdict: Users may overlook glitchy scanning performance thanks to its ability to pair with both iOS and Android tablets.
pros: Easy to set up and use, even for first-timers
Bluetooth pairs seamlessly with most devices, including iPads
Offline mode stores and transfers barcodes easily
cons: Sleep mode is annoying, disconnecting Bluetooth each time, and instructions to remove aren’t clear
Scanning smaller or different-color barcodes is problematic
Unit can fail after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Lag Time When Asleep, but Fixable with Help from Support
customer_reviews.text: Did not work every time. We have to wake it up in order for it to work effectively. After about 8-10 seconds it works well. I just wish it was quick on the draw. REVISION - I received an email from Customer Support with steps on how to keep off sleep mode. After a couple of bar code scans they provided, the scanner stays ready every time. Thanks to Teemi Customer Support!
customer_reviews.author: V-Pops

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service and support, great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for a few months now, and have played around with it, but just really started to get into it tonight with a new inventory and shipping system. I noticed the instructions that came with it provided a code to scan to change the suffix from enter to tab, but not back. I emailed the support alias listed in the documentation, not expecting anything, and they actually returned my email with the correct data in literally a matter of minutes. Exemplary customer service, I will buy a dozen more of these things as our business expands. Nicely done. 8/30/2015
customer_reviews.author: Anderson House

customer_reviews.title: This works great for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This works great for what we needed. We needed something that would help expedite our data entry from tracking and serial number labels, and this works flawlessly. The Bluetooth option is great and provides the ability to move around a 3000 sqft warehouse and still inputs information back to the main computer, located at the front of the warehouse. Not sure how it would work with software pairing, so I cannot speak on that, but highly reccommend for data entry needs.
customer_reviews.author: Coy A. Alter

customer_reviews.title: This is a great scanner, especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scanner, especially considering the price. Very easy to use, once you figure out the bluetooth pairing. Instructions are not terribly clear, but once figured out they work great. Most especially impressive is the customer service of the seller. I purchased 3 of these, but did not use one until 9 months later. I then discovered that the battery would not hold a charge. I contacted the seller, and they immediately volunteered to send a new unit, no questions asked. They shipped the unit promptly, only asking that I return the defective unit. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: but I would like a fix soon
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scanner with an iPad 2 running iOS 9 successfully for years. When I paired it with an iPad mini 4 running iOS 11 to scan barcodes into Amazon's search bar, it only showed part of the barcode. It works correctly with some of my other apps. The TEEMI support has sent various possible fixes including a more expensive model, the TMSL-55. At first the new model didn't work either. The support team sent to new barcodes to scan. Now everything is working well. It was a pleasure dealing with TEEMI's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Grambo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Once you figure out the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scanner, but I had a few problems with the IFU. If you're pairing with a PC with Windows 7, way number 6 worked right off the bat. I had some difficulty with using #3. I found that pairing with my iPad was not a problem - once you follow the directions! Something I'm not great at. I'd say that the IFU could be a bit more intuitive, but you just have to be careful to follow it exactly and the device works fine. It does a great job of scanning - reads VERY easily. The price is great, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: If you want a basic scanner this is a great place to start
customer_reviews.text: If you want a basic scanner this is a great place to start. Following the instructions I had it paired to my Surface Pro 4 in about 2 minutes. The only con I have found is that the beam is really wide so if you are trying to read a bar code off big list (a cheat sheet of bar codes) you have to hold the scanner pretty close to the page to get the one you want. A very minor nitpick at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this (wink, wink)
customer_reviews.text: Very long lasting battery nd works great. i love the wireless feature, I hate being tied down.
customer_reviews.author: RustyJD

customer_reviews.title: If your barcodes are always in great shape, this is a good scanner
customer_reviews.text: Has trouble with barcodes that are not near-perfect. If your barcodes are always in great shape, this is a good scanner, however if you're dealing with a variety of barcodes in both font sizes (it doesn't do well with excessively small barcodes, either) or condition, this one may not be the best for you. Seems like a good product otherwise, though.
customer_reviews.author: jasondunstan

customer_reviews.title: Research before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit Oct 2018, to assist with entering barcodes. Unfortunately, I did not get around to using it until February 2019 only to find out that the holograms I use are not supported by this 2018 Model scanner.
customer_reviews.author: David Comesanas

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for.  If you want something trouble-free, you will have to buy a more expensive competitor scanner
customer_reviews.text: It works but it is too complicated to set up. You have to keep a sheet of paper with bar codes and scan a series of bar codes in order to set it up. I had to do this multiple times and sometimes it works and sometimes it does not. I got this to speed up more work but it actually slowed me down.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a really good price . The price was good for my needs and woks great .
customer_reviews.author: Rtaylor8802

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I could never get the scanner to pair with my iPad pro but it works very well with the mini that I have in my office. We are using it to scan in asset tag codes and serial number codes for computers that the school has purchased.
customer_reviews.author: netman044

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good functionality for the price. Set up to work with iOS was a bit of a chore. However, finally got it to work. Don't let the look fool you, it is a bit smaller than the regular handheld scanner. However, I'm sure the ladies will like it just because it's not so cluncky. Best of all, wireless!
customer_reviews.author: la3211

customer_reviews.title: TEEMI stands by their products
customer_reviews.text: We use these scanners for shipping items at our warehouse and they work great. However, the scan line on one of them became a scan dot and so the scanner wouldn't work anymore. We contacted TEEMI and they quickly sent us a replacement. Nice to see a company that stands by their products!
customer_reviews.author: Philip D. Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these in our "camp store" for 3 summers. Very reliable. Keeps charge for a long time. Easily pairs with different tablets and computers, old and new.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Covington

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner...not sure about battery duration though.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this scanner for a few months now and it was great until recently. It scans very accurately. The problem is the battery. I used to be able to scan all day with it after charging it all night. Now the battery only lasts 10 or 15 min. I have to have it plugged into a external battery so it doesn't die on me. So it's not really wireless for me anymore...which kind of sucks. I changed my review from 1 star to 4 stars because TEEMI sent me a free replacement. Very good customer service! Maybe I got a defective battery...we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Heflin

customer_reviews.title: Employee Tested, Geek Approved.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how something so small can achieve such big results. I read some other reviews that setup wasn't easy - they must have 0 experience setting up anything Bluetooth because this was easy as pie. The scanner itself is fantastic and I found that the signal doesn't drop like some other BT scanners. After buying 6 different BT test scanners, we chose this one for our company.
customer_reviews.author: A. Falack

customer_reviews.title: Super Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 and they always connect easily (Keep the barcode sheer that comes with them). I drop them too often and they keep going. I use them between tablets, computers (windows and Mac), and phones. Btw I never leave reviews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pairing it with my iPhone was not easy, but after figuring it out it worked pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Pairing it with my iPhone was not easy, but after figuring it out it worked pretty well. Can't compare with others as this is my first barcode scanner, but it is very accurate and fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good distance, lousy directions
customer_reviews.text: Setup was not very easy, the instructions included were in a different language. Once I headed to their website to get the software/pairing instructions, I was set. The range on this thing is what redeems my review. It really works at a much greater distance than I expected. I was able to operate it successfully up to 30 feet away!
customer_reviews.author: Prosinader

customer_reviews.title: Works really well - nice feature set
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works very well. Lots of features. Read the info/instruction sheet that comes with it. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: ZeightyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Includes a power supply which is important if used in ...
customer_reviews.text: Includes a power supply which is important if used in continuous mode which is needed in manufacturing. Otherwise, the scanner must to re-connect with the handheld device after the auto-off delay.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre J. VERCAMMEN

customer_reviews.title: works good for continuous use
customer_reviews.text: works good for continuous use, but if you use it only occasionally, it sucks with an ipad where you have to go back to bluetooth, find it and reconnect after just a few minutes and it powers down.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use!!! Started scanning inventory in my store right away. Connect easily to macbook laptop. Can't wait to connect this to my ipad and iphone. Great product!!! Will be buying more for my store in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff DiSante

customer_reviews.title: Nice item but not the most dependable as we have ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice item but not the most dependable as we have both more than a few of these but maybe we are just too hard on them....it is a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worked at all, tried few times to load ...
customer_reviews.text: not worked at all, tried few times to load and start it , but no success. no where to communicate and ask for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Massoud Rahmati

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Instructions to get started were a little confusing. Worked well once figured out. In using an iPad needing to shut off the scanner before being able to use the virtual keyboard is a bit of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Barry A. Degrappo

customer_reviews.title: When it's awake it works very good. The problem with it is if it's idle ...
customer_reviews.text: When it's awake it works very good. The problem with it is if it's idle for a couple of minutes it goes to sleep and it's hard to wake up. I purchased it to use in a convenience store environment and it will go to sleep between customers and it slows the process down when you get busy and have to wait seconds which feels like minutes when you have to continually wake it up. The Bluetooth is very hard to keep connected.
customer_reviews.author: harry wood

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scanner. It works well with scanning books.
customer_reviews.author: Girl from the Village

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every 10 minutes it reboots. And scans are queued. No obvious firmware updates available.
customer_reviews.author: QuestionSwami

customer_reviews.title: A bona fide workhorse. I use it with my ...
customer_reviews.text: A bona fide workhorse. I use it with my phone and laptop, no drama switching--just plug in the USB cord when I want the latter. Reasonably robust to handle a few bumps, not too heavy, not too big. Would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: William Leverette

customer_reviews.title: husband said this works great for using for his work
customer_reviews.text: husband said this works great for using for his work. help cut down on time with his bar code numbers he needs to put in and be accountable for his equipment at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Mears

customer_reviews.title: It works but requires patience
customer_reviews.text: The only positive I can say about it, is that it is wireless. Unfortunately, it takes forever to "wake" up when you use it and creates a delay on the scan.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hale

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Does great job Pairing to iOS kinda tricky but I got it done. Great product
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: I have not received the USB wireless in the box
customer_reviews.text: I have not received the USB wireless in the box
customer_reviews.author: MiguelAHB

customer_reviews.title: issues
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was my PC, the bluetooth piece or what, but I could never get it to connect via BT or wired, so I had to send back. Opted for a Honeywell brand, wired one and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I do inventory receiving for a large retail facility and wanted a cordless scanner but didn't want to drop $350+ for a Honeywell or Motorolla. This doesn't have the heft, feel or laser range of the more expensive units, but it works. TIP : Everyone complains about the set up. It's easy once you figure out how to RESTART and SHUT DOWN the scanner (press and hold trigger). I was beating my head against the wall until I contacted them.
customer_reviews.author: GWags

customer_reviews.title: barcode scanner
customer_reviews.text: Received on time for our inventory. I been using wireless scanners for two years and they make doing inventory easy and fast. I like this one because I can wire it to a computer or wireless to a laptop / tablet / pc with blue tooth. It working great with pc and android tablet but I still trying to hook up to an apple ipad, I would like if these company make an adapter so you can mount an Ipod to the gun as one unit then it will make inventory even faster.
customer_reviews.author: FAST FRED

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Great service takes the prize.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I had a defective unit. Teemi's support is great. I emailed them and got a response within 12 hours and they are now mailing me a replacement that will be here on Monday (2 days). Great service. Will update again soon. Complete garbage. I used it one time and it worked great. Now I come back a few weeks later and it won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I use the scanner for inventory, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the scanner paired to an iPhone, iPad, Macbook Air. No issues. If the paring barcodes that come with the scanner get lost you can find them on their website. I use the scanner for inventory, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D. Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Easily synced to computer and have used numerous times
customer_reviews.text: Received as promised. Easily synced to computer and have used numerous times. It worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: R Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good scanner use it for amazon and ebay item research.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Does what it says it does and is very cost-efficient. We have just started using it today and are very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a chance and it works perfectly for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ersin Borluca

customer_reviews.title: Barcode Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Windows 10 on laptop with built in wifi but has trouble connecting on Windows 10 laptop without Bluetooth. Windows 10 Doesn't work right with Bluetooth dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to read instructions to set up correctly. After that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Clearly the product is poor quality. Most disappointed in the time I've wasted ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there is no one to answer their customer service. It appears this is the same device several others sell as well. Its been 2 months of screwing around with this product and it still doesn't work. Wont pair to my MAC. The instructions state to use the Bluetooth Set Up Assistant that doesn't exist anymore. Pairing is a very simple thing to do on a Mac. Clearly the product is poor quality. Most disappointed in the time I've wasted trying to get it to pair. Try another seller for better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Good barcode scanner. Easy to set up and use. Works on my tablet too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little device has helped speed up our shipping & recording process tremendously!

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 of these in use for a small business. No issues with any of them. We continue to buy as we continue to grow. Good product.

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great wifi scanner! Works really well with my iPad air. Lightweight and easy to install. Priced right compared to other models out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bethk

customer_reviews.title: Instructions definatley written in China.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the instructions are total junk but the product is great.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and with everything
customer_reviews.text: Works well with both PC and Mac. Using it with bluetooth on iPad and a Dell. It even works with an iPhone 5s.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: TEEMI wireless scanner was quickly replaced after it malfunctioned...emailed Teemi on Saturday had a new unit in my Mailbox on Monday...it’s working with my IPhone 8 and all’s good....Thank You TEEMI Team. Don
customer_reviews.author: Don Signorovitch

customer_reviews.title: Automatic pairing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works great! Automatic pairing without having to enter a code is really great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, as described and as expected. A little cumbersome in the set up process.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Was NOT compatible with Windows 10 (Advertised as such, ...
customer_reviews.text: Was NOT compatible with Windows 10 (Advertised as such, but instructions in box indicated otherwise. We were eventually not able to use it).
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Scanner worked for one day while being plugged in the computer. The Scanner doesn't work wireless

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unit. works with android
customer_reviews.text: Perfect unit. works with android, IOS devices and Windows. Currently hooked up to a Windows 10 tablet. Also connected to android device for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: This scanner is lightweight and easy to grip.  The length of cord is enough to get most jobs done the first time without moving
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is lightweight and easy to grip. The length of cord is enough to get most jobs done the first time without moving stuff around.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working very good so far. Great prices and lead time
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cuello

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Worked right out of the box with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Worked right out of the box with my Mac computer, no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Mary  M.

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as the comparable Symbol (Zebra) scanner at a much lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: The Other Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought several of these. Easy to use, great product for the price. Have had some minor issues but for the price, a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was more complicated than necessary and now it doesn't work at all. Customer Service number on the site just rings & no one has returned my email for support. Not Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Purchased 2 in February - ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Purchased 2 in February - one does not scan anymore, the other one is constantly breaking down.
customer_reviews.author: carla boyadjian

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We used it with an Android tablet. Read the instructions and paired it in less than a minute. Acts like a keyboard - whatever you scan appears in the text box. Unit has a solid feel. Used the USB to plug it into my PC and was able to scan without changing any settings. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: EWC Controls Inc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sadly- it doesn't work with square, wish it would have said that in the descriptor
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK AT TRADE SHOWS
customer_reviews.text: WE PURCHASED THESE FOR A TRADESHOW SO THAT WE COULD SCAN OUR PRODUCTS. DID NOT WORK! WE HAVE ANOTHER SHOW COMING UP IN ONE MONTH, SO BEFORE WE RETURN THIS ITEM BACK, WE ARE GOING TO GIVE IT ONE MORE CHANCE. BE AWARE OF WHAT YOU ARE BUYING! BLUE TOOTH KEPT ON DISCONNECTING AND THE SCANNER DID NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Gourmet Cook

customer_reviews.title: Item works great, instructions stink
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works well in spite of the very vague, poorly written and badly organized instructions. Once we figured out which bar code to scan to activate it, we had no more problems.
customer_reviews.author: Midvale Community Library

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: This bar code scanner works great with my i pad 2 was vary easy to set up. . Just as described

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were perfect, everything works great. I use this for inventory, paired to an old iphone. Planning to buy 4 more

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid, setup with Windows 8 was a breeze, and it works flawlessly so far. Great value.

customer_reviews.text: It’s not working at all , it’s brand new product with malfunction, no laser to hit the barcode .

customer_reviews.text: He can not do the job, it is inadequate. Installation is very difficult and not plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Akdogan

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded 2 in 1 1d Barcode Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scanner on an iPhone, iPad. iPod Touch, Samsung and several other andriod devices and it works great. Easy to install and operate. Will be getting more of them to take inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Surf

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Using these on iPads and Computers running IOS 7 / Windows 7/8. They work perfectly and fast. Setup is easy as long as you know how to read the instruction sheet as the way they lay out the instructions is in a weird order.
customer_reviews.author: ron/dyl

customer_reviews.title: Bar Code Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Has an ability to toggle keyboard inputs on and off. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 and worked perfectly with my android 4.2 tablets. We use them in an inventory control System and we are getting very fast and good results
customer_reviews.author: Roger Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It stopped charging after using it for abut 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lebelge

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: It worked like I expected, has been work ever since. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Connectivity Issue After using for a while
customer_reviews.text: Starts out working great, then after a while of use, serious Bluetooth connectivity issues arise. Once initial pairing is made, it sometimes takes a while for the scanner to connect to device (device: Samsung Galaxy Tab A) After using for a few months,,, the Bluetooth connection becomes very unstable,, i.e connect, disconnect, connect disconnect. Warranty for return to Amazon had of course ran out. So, I contacted the manufacturer to try and get a resolution to the issue. After thoroughly explaining the problem to them, there one and only recommendation was turn off sleep mode (which did not work or solve the problem). I do not recommend buying this device.
customer_reviews.author: ScanTechSolutions

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Great product and Amazing Technical support!!! What else do you want...
customer_reviews.author: Adriana L. Chuman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Only have been using for 1 month, the battery in one of the 2 scanners, good seller.
customer_reviews.author: AMERICA DIGITAL ACCESSORIES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works on Apple I Pad Pro and great customer service. [...]
customer_reviews.author: legcypm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, likes to unsync from devices
customer_reviews.text: Unsyncs all the time, made of cheap plastic, and doesn't work with Bluetooth dongle without wanting to throw it across the room for having to troubleshoot it constantly. Need to retain the original instructions booklet to resync, I will never buy a product from this company. I feel like I was ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Scanner Worked Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this product, and it didn't work at all. It wouldn't connect to ANY PC device. I contacted the seller and they replaced it with a newer model that had just recently come out. This product connected and worked perfectly. I am not sure if the original scanner is not meant for PCs at all, or I just received a bad scanner. Either way, TEEMI made sure I was satisfied with the new scanner and I appreciate it. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on the I5s phone. Tricky to set up Bluetooth otherwise worked well.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: good seller
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received didn't work but they were quick at replacing it. =)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: There were so many different price ranges for these laser scanner guns and I just took a shot in the dark. Good shot! Easy to install, wireless works great, and the battery life is great as well! Sometimes cheaper is still better.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Weihe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner and it works on my cell phone and my PC.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my iPad
customer_reviews.text: I was worried but i paired it easily with my iPad Air. It works excellent. I was so happy with how well it worked, I bought another iPad air and scanner for my business.
customer_reviews.author: RJBJR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on all my devices and labtop. Plus, I'm getting excellent support from seller!
customer_reviews.author: erin scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great on IOS devices
customer_reviews.text: I originally had some issues with the device however the company was very quick to make sure that a properly working device was sent to me and that device connected right away to both my IPAD and IPhone and I was able to successfully re-connect to the devices as I needed to. The price is right and the device works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thrall-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner, not that rugged.
customer_reviews.text: Decent scanner for the price. Not that rugged. One or two good drops from 4+ feet and this thing is probably toast. Long internal battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner
customer_reviews.text: The barcode scanner is just what we needed for a busy library! We can use it with our PC or the iPad to check books in and out. Great prompt service and the scanner was deliveded on the date indicated. Would not be hesitant to use TEEMI again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Cole

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Works well until it breaks. I have had 2 of them and both have lasted 4 months max.
customer_reviews.author: Haya Matsumoto

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return for refund but does not seem available ...
customer_reviews.text: Item stopped working 2.5 months after order. Would like to return for refund but does not seem available now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: dont buy unless you can read Chinese -
customer_reviews.text: All the instructions are in Chinese. You can't even pair it with your device.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

product_meta.title: TEEMI Bluetooth Barcode Scanner, 1d Laser Handheld Automatic Bar Code Reader for iPhone iPad Android Tablet PC, Mac OS X, Android, Windows 10 and iOS 12, Enable Keyboard Entry
feature_bullets: 【Easy Connection and Longer transfer Distance】 Password-free Connection without scanning any pairing barcodes, just search and connect; the max transfer distance extends from 32ft to 196ft
【Free your hand】 You can activate Automatic scanning mode for quick scanning without pressing the trigger

【2-in-One Connection】Wired and Bluetooth Connection. It supports Windows, Mac OS, and Linux; works with QuickBooks, Word, Excel, Novell; and almost all common software. It can be widely used in supermarkets, shopping malls, cosmetic stores, retail industry, postal industry, logistics, banks and medical institutions.

【Inventory mode】It can save the scanned data in the memory and upload in batch. If the scanner is out of bluetooth range under instant upload mode, the scanner will automatically save the scanned data and then transmit when it reconnects to the receiver automatically.

【Strong Recognition Ability and Durable Design】It reads various types of 1D barcode like UPC, EAN, Codebar, Code 39, Fedex, UPS, USPS Tracking number, VIN numbers. For screen and 2D codes, please kindly go for TMSL-55 or TMSL-56 scanner.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars198 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
